content: this is a free 4 page pattern for a festive outfit designed to fit my pocket paige doll you can find the doll in this pattern here 1 this free outfit pattern includes fair isle dress mary jane shoes headband the **hair** for the doll modelling this outfit can be found in this pattern 2 this pattern has been tested by several wonderful members of the weebee appreciation society facebook group 4 and every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free and ready for sale weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since weebee has a fabulously big head shaped feet hands with thumbs and a lovely round tummy and bottom - i m sure you ll fall in love with weebee as much as i have finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale yarn and hook size my weebee doll patterns are designed so that you can use any yarn or hook of your choice to achieve different sized dolls to your liking therefore the clothing patterns have no specific yarn or hook size specifications but information is contained within which will help you to create the perfect fit for your specific doll terminology us other items needed tapestry needle format of pattern pdf - 4 pages style written with all abbreviations and special stitches noted in the pattern as well as guidance images where appropriate if you have any questions or queries about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me text and images by laura tegg all rights reserved no pattern may be reproduced or distributed mechanically electronically or by any other means including photocopying without written permission finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale design credit should be given to laura tegg when items are listed for sale 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/weebee---pocket-paige-doll 2 https //api ravelry com/patterns/library/weebee-pocket-paige-doll---boys-hair--outfit 3 https //www ravelry com/bundles/click-here-to-find-the-standard-size-weebee-dress-me-up-collection 4 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/permalink/1596728580629421/ comment_id=1596745213961091&notif_t=group_comment_reply&notif_id=1473760252605093
